    static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule
    jacksonModuleDTT()
    Custom Jackson-Module that provides serialization and deserialization for DateTimeTriplet, which is useful to apply into ObjectMapper
    static DateTimeTriplet
    parseAny(String dttStr)
    Performs the subsequent attempts to parse the passed string dttStr with: parseIsoInstant(String) parseEpochSeconds(String) parseNatural(String) ... and returns either an instance of DateTimeTriplet or null if the input string is blank.

    static ZoneOffset
    systemZoneOffset()
    Gets the current value of ZoneOffset, which depends on system settings of operational system and on the current time (because of daylight saving time).

  • Method Details

    • systemZoneOffset

      public static ZoneOffset systemZoneOffset()
      Gets the current value of ZoneOffset, which depends on system settings of operational system and on the current time (because of daylight saving time).
      Returns:
      the current value of ZoneOffset

    • parseIsoInstant

      public static DateTimeTriplet parseIsoInstant(String instantStr)
      Transform the string-representation of Instant in ISO_INSTANT-format into DateTimeTriplet
      Parameters:
      instantStr - string-representation of Instant in format like 2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z.
      Returns:
      the instance of DateTimeTriplet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - in case of null, blank or any invalid string
      See Also:
      • Instant.parse(CharSequence)

    • parseEpochSeconds

      public static DateTimeTriplet parseEpochSeconds(String epochSecondsStr)
      Transform the string-representation of epoch-seconds into DateTimeTriplet
      Parameters:
      epochSecondsStr - string-representation of epoch-seconds (that is a standard long)
      Returns:
      the instance of DateTimeTriplet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - in case of null, blank or any invalid string

    • parseNatural

      public static DateTimeTriplet parseNatural(String dttStr)
      Parse the result of DateTimeTriplet.dump() or DateTimeTriplet.dumpNoWeek() back to original instance of DateTimeTriplet.
      Parameters:
      dttStr - the string with data-time in format "yyyy-MM-dd [\'(\'EEE\') \']HH:mm"
      Returns:
      the instance of DateTimeTriplet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - in case of null, blank or any invalid string

    • parseAny

      public static DateTimeTriplet parseAny(String dttStr)
      Performs the subsequent attempts to parse the passed string dttStr with:
      • parseIsoInstant(String)
      • parseEpochSeconds(String)
      • parseNatural(String)
      ... and returns either an instance of DateTimeTriplet or null if the input string is blank.
      Parameters:
      dttStr - the string in any supported formats (ISO_INSTANT, epoch-seconds, natural)
      Returns:
      the instance of DateTimeTriplet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - in case of the passed string is not blank and could not be parsed

    • jacksonModuleDTT

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule jacksonModuleDTT()
      Custom Jackson-Module that provides serialization and deserialization for DateTimeTriplet, which is useful to apply into ObjectMapper
      Returns:
      an instance of SimpleModule that provides serialization and deserialization for DateTimeTriplet
